results.name: Expansion of 1/(1+x-x^2+2*x^3).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1,1,-2).
formula: G.f.: Q(0)/2 , where Q(k) = 1 + 1/(1 - x*(4*k+1 - x + 2*x^2 )/( x*(4*k+3 - x + 2*x^2 ) - 1/Q(k+1) )); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 09 2013
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{-1,1,-2}, {1,-1,2}, 40] (* or *) CoefficientList[ Series[1/(1+x-x^2+2*x^3), {x,0,40}], x] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 24 2019 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
